pageContext.name: Amy Cruz

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Amy Cruz is an undergraduate student in the College of Information Science with a minor in Statistics. Her focus is in Data Science, and she worked in a year-long co-op working in the data science and data engineering fields on a project involving record linkage and natural language research.

Amy is working with MITH in Summer 2022 on a data curation project involving natural language processing and topic modeling on transcripts of MITH's Digital Dialogues lecture series.

title: Student Assistant
